pages.text: 37|103|antatah, jab donon ne svayan ko arpit kar diya aur us (pita) ne use gira diya maathe ke bal.
37|104|tab hamane use aavaaz dee ki he ibraaheem
37|105|toone sach kar diya apana svapn. isee prakaar, ham pratiphal pradaan karate hain sadaachaariyon ko.
37|106|vaastav mein, ye khulee pareeksha thee.
37|107|aur hamane usake mukti-pratidaan ke roop mein, pradaan kar dee ek mahaan[1] balee.
37|108|tatha hamane shesh rakhee usakee shubh charcha pichhalon mein.
37|109|salaam hai ibreem par.
37|110|isee prakaar, ham pratiphal pradaan karate hain sadaachaariyon ko.
37|111|nishchay hee vah hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein se tha.
37|112|tatha hamane use shubhasoochana dee ishaaq nabee kee, jo sadaachaariyon mein[1] hoga.
37|113|tatha hamane barakat (vibhooti) avatarik kee usapar tatha ishaaq par aur un donon kee santati mein se koee sadaachaaree hai aur koee apane lie khula atyaachaaree.
37|114|tatha hamane upakaar kiya moosa aur haaroon par.
37|115|tatha mukt kiya donon ko aur unakee jaati ko, ghor vyagrata se.
37|116|tatha hamane sahaayata kee unakee, to vahee prabhaavashaalee ho gaye.
37|117|tatha hamane pradaan kee donon ko prakaashamay pustak (tauraat).
37|118|aur hamane darshaee donon ko seedhee dagar.
37|119|tatha shesh rakhee donon kee shubh charcha, pichhalon mein.
37|120|salaam hai moosa tatha haaroon par.
37|121|ham isee prakaar pratiphal pradaan karate hain, sadaachaariyon ko.
37|122|vastutah, ve donon hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein the.
37|123|tatha nishchay ilyaas, nabiyon mein se tha.
37|124|jab kaha usane apanee jaati seh kya tum darate nahin ho
37|125|kya tum baal ( naamak moorti) ko pukaarate ho? tatha tyaag rahe ho sarvottam utpattikarta ko
37|126|allaah hee tumhaara paalanahaar hai tatha tumhaare pratham poorvajon ka paalanahaar hai.
